data.title: Clifton, NJ
data.meta_description: The Clerk's Office handles administrative duties such as record keeping, staffing, service counters, screening solicitors, and more.
data.text:
Scheduled Appointments

Appointments for obtaining a Marriage License or Domestic Partnership can be scheduled by calling 973-470-5825 during our normal business hours. Please note that Scheduled Appointments are required for the following:

Domestic Partnership

Marriage License

Requirements for a Marriage License / Domestic Partnership

View the requirements and download an application for a Marriage License, Civil Union or Domestic Partnership. After reviewing the requirements, contact our office for an appointment.

Marriage License Application (PDF)

Obtaining Copies of Certificates of Births, Deaths or Marriage Licenses (PDF)

Garage Sales

A permit is required to hold a garage, yard, estate sale, etc. Anyone wishing to obtain a garage sale permit must go to the City Clerkâ€™s Office to obtain the permit. The permit is $10 and must be displayed at the location of the sale. As a courtesy, a listing of garage sales will be published on the City website. Anyone obtaining a permit after 4:00 p.m. on Friday, will not be published on the website.
